name: generated_properties_VTT Modernization Requirements
description: Generated properties for VTT Modernization Requirements

properties.name: vtt_system_accept_wav_req_transcription_001
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL accept WAV, MP3, FLAC, and M4A audio formats...

properties.name: vtt_system_complete_transcription_req_transcription_001
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL complete transcription within 2x the audio duration...

properties.name: vtt_system_preserve_audio_req_transcription_001
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL preserve audio metadata during processing...

properties.name: when_primary_transcription_req_fallback_002
properties.description: Property test for: WHEN primary transcription engine fails, THE VTT_System SHALL automatically switch to secondary engi...

properties.name: vtt_system_complete_fallback_req_fallback_002
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL complete fallback transition within 5 seconds...

properties.name: vtt_system_log_all_req_fallback_002
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL log all fallback events with timestamp and reason...

properties.name: vtt_system_encrypt_all_req_security_003
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL encrypt all temporary audio files using AES-256...

properties.name: vtt_system_delete_temporary_req_security_003
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL delete temporary files within 60 seconds of processing completion...

properties.name: vtt_system_never_transmit_req_security_003
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL never transmit audio data to external servers...

properties.name: vtt_system_audit_all_req_security_003
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL audit all file access operations...

properties.name: vtt_system_process_minute_req_performance_004
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL process 1-minute audio in less than 30 seconds on CPU...

properties.name: vtt_system_use_less_req_performance_004
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL use less than 2GB RAM during transcription...

properties.name: vtt_system_cache_frequently_req_performance_004
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL cache frequently used models to reduce loading time...

properties.name: audio_file_corrupted_req_error_handling_005
properties.description: Property test for: IF audio file is corrupted, THEN THE VTT_System SHALL display specific error message...

properties.name: vtt_system_provide_retry_req_error_handling_005
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL provide retry mechanism for failed transcriptions...

properties.name: vtt_system_recover_gracefully_req_error_handling_005
properties.description: Property test for: THE VTT_System SHALL recover gracefully from memory exhaustion...
